final_answer:
The image is humorous because it plays on the contrast between expectation and reality using the text "YES, BUT." 

In the first panel, the intact ice cream cone represents the ideal or expected scenario—everything seems perfect. The second panel shows a broken cone, symbolizing an unexpected flaw that undermines the original positive impression. This contrast is funny because it captures the relatable experience of something seemingly perfect having an unexpected downside. The use of simple imagery and text makes the humor clear and effective.
